Bishop Gene Robinson has entered into a civil union in New Hampshire with his longtime spouse. Here's a link to the story from the Washington Post, along with the headline: 
 
 http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2008/06/08/AR2008060800775.html?hpid=sec-religion
 
 "Gay Anglican U.S. bishop enters into civil union"
